title: Assassins
body:
So I was running 6 assassins, 2 brawlers, 3 void (8 units total)

Anyway I had my two brawlers in the back so that the enemy units had to move towards my team, as anyone using assassins normally would. Except the enemy units didn't. They never moved towards my units as the round started, so my assassins never got behind the enemies. And no, they didn't have a bunch of RFCs. So my question is: What the fuck and what should I have done differently?

replies.body: Okay, but this was a constant theme the entire match. It didn't matter where I placed my brawlers, the enemy team didn't approach them.

I don't think it was you doing something wrong.  For some reason, a team might decide it's not going to move and instead lets the other team walk up to it before engaging.  It's pretty irregular, but I've found it can happen with any team in any one particular battle, even if it doesn't the next time when fighting the exact same team.

I hope it gets fixed.
